item.title: Aspose.Font | Java Font Processing API | TT, CFF, OT, Type1
item.description: Java API for Various Font Formats Product Page | Docs | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Font for Java is a font loading and drawing library. It supports multiple front formats such as TrueType (with TrueType collectons), CFF, OpenType, and Type1. The API provides rich functionality to load/save font and provide information about its data structures along with any glyph that is supported by all the font types.
